aboutpara: I am a PhD student at Universit√© Laval, specializing in operations and decision systems with a focus on auction-based procurement in truckload transportation. With a background in computer science and intelligent systems, I apply artificial intelligence and optimization to address real-world logistics challenges. I am currently part of the CIRRELT research center, where I contribute to applied research in smart transportation and operational efficiency.

projects.title: Food Recommendation System
projects.description: AI-based system to predict customer behavior and recommend meals based on user preferences (Private Mitacs project).

projects.title: Traffic Light Optimization
projects.description: Deep reinforcement learning project using DQN/DDQN and SUMO to optimize traffic light control.

projects.title: E-Hospital Management System
projects.description: A full-stack web platform developed during the pandemic for managing hospital care, including appointments and records.

projects.title: Archery Mixed-Reality Game
projects.description: An immersive mixed-reality archery training game developed during a research internship. Includes a virtual coach and multiplayer support. (Private project)

services.title: AI & Optimization Research
services.description: I build intelligent systems and optimization models for logistics and transportation, bridging AI and operations research.

services.title: Data Science & Modeling
services.description: I develop predictive models and analyze structured and unstructured data for smarter decision-making.

services.title: Scientific & Technical Writing
services.description: I write academic papers and technical reports, ensuring clarity, rigor, and accessibility in research dissemination.

resume.tagline: üéì PhD Student in Operations & Decision Systems
resume.description: Combining AI and optimization to solve complex problems in transportation and logistics.

experiences.bullets: Research on auction-based procurement models; Development of optimization tools for truckload transport; Collaboration within interdisciplinary teams.
Developed automotive software; Analyzed network traffic using Wireshark; Performed protocol testing (CAN, DoIP, XCP).
Built a food recommendation system using AI; Conducted behavioral analysis of purchasing patterns.
Developed an archery game in mixed reality; Designed a virtual coach using AI.
Projects on Upwork/ComeUp: Exploratory analysis, model design, and delivery of AI-based insights.

education.universityPara: PhD in Administration Sciences, focusing on operations and decision systems, with applications in logistics and transportation auctions.
